subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Frauds and Swindling
lead_paragraph: German prosecutors dropped a fraud investigation against the former Tour de France winner Jan Ullrich in return for a fine. The deal ended a 21-month investigation into whether the retired Ullrich defrauded his T-Mobile team by taking performance-enhancing drugs, thus increasing his income by illegal means.
